text: The 2019 Levene Gouldin & Thompson Tennis Challenger was a professional tennis tournament played on hard court. It was the 26th edition of the tournament which was part of the 2019 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Binghamton, United States between 22 and 28 July 2019. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! João Menezes 7–6(7–2), 1–6, 6–2. === Doubles === * Max Purcell / Luke Saville def. JC Aragone / Alex Lawson 6–4, 4–6, [10–5]. ==References== ==External links== *Official Website Levene Gouldin and Thompson Tennis Challenger 2019 Levene Gouldin and Thompson Tennis Challenger Category:July 2019 sports events in the United States
